Text: Hope you guys enjoy it. Let me know how it works for you. I've also got all the previous seasons uploaded as well. Don't forget to seed.
Thank you very much! You are the man :)

And thank you for downloading. If you guys have time be sure to put A/V quality up for our other downloaders. Whether you feel its good or bad its important for other people to get some opinions before taking the time to download.

Thanks VERY much for these ULs.  And, please understand that on season  8 you got the Black Rock quote right (probably) but you understood it bass ackwards. The quote means it take something BIG to make such a man mad.
Thanks a ton for these ULs. I've been looking for a while for good quality uploads of all the seasons in one place, and i finally found it! my only question is when the next seasons will be uploaded?
